sentences.english: Circular or rectangular duct can be specified.
sentences.chinese: 可指定是圓形管或矩形管。

sentences.english: When the rectangle's events are triggered, the text's attributes change accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 觸發矩形的事件時，文本的屬性就會相應地改變。

sentences.english: Next, create a red rectangular box.
sentences.chinese: 未來，創造一個紅色矩形框。

sentences.english: A study has been made on the determination of locating orien…
sentences.chinese: 還對矩形物體佈局時定位方向的確定進行了研究。

sentences.english: Form pyriform to oblong or elongated .
When I hover over each person, I want a rectangular box to appear.
sentences.chinese: 當鼠標停留在每個人身上時，我希望出現一個矩形框。

sentences.english: The other distinctive feature of this screen is the rounded rectangles.
sentences.chinese: 此屏幕的另一個獨特的特徵是圓角矩形。

sentences.english: The hook ends of the draw robs are installed in the rectangular slotted holes and hook the ring strips.
sentences.chinese: 拉桿的鉤形端裝在該矩形槽孔中勾住環條。

sentences.english: This should bring up a marquee around the planet.
sentences.chinese: 這樣應當會在行星四周生成一個矩形選區。

sentences.english: The key of this problem is to find the optimized layout of two-dimensional plane.
sentences.chinese: 矩形件下料問題的關鍵是尋找二維平面的優化佈局。
這種換流器是矩形波控制。

sentences.english: The system needs the coordinates of the minimized rectangle for the window.
sentences.chinese: 系統需要窗體的最小矩形框的座標。

sentences.english: The horizontal spread of the rectangular V-type curved otter board increased by 43.
sentences.chinese: 矩形V型曲面網板的水平擴張力可增大43。

sentences.english: The item with black squares is always the last one you click and is treated as the anchor item.
sentences.chinese: 具有黑色矩形的項目被視爲錨定項並只能最後單擊。

sentences.english: Rect field in an Editor Window.
sentences.chinese: 在編輯器窗口中的矩形字段。

sentences.english: Using the Rectangular Marquee Tool (M), create a rectangular selection, then use the Brush Tool (B) to select a big, rounded brush.
sentences.chinese: 用矩形選框工具，建立矩形選區。

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg

pinyin: bu4 gui1 ze2 si4 bian1 xing2
